description: Designed with the help of Conrad Anker, these approach socks use a merino wool blend and seamless construction to keep your feet happy on the way to your vertical adventure. An Achilles strap protects your ankles from rocks and other trail debris.Made of soft merino wool, nylon and elastane.4-degree elite fit system uses 2 types of elastic for stretch, recovery and to keep the sock in place.Indestructawool Technology in high-impact areas for comfort.Mesh ventilation zones provide moisture management.Virtually Seamless™ toe for chafe-free wear.
name: Smartwool PhD Pro Approach Crew Socks - Unisex
